# Power Surge (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S, XP

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Wand or staff touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 114

By touching a wand or staff that has at least 1 charge, you imbue it with 1 temporary charge per five caster levels. These charges work like temporary hit points: When a character uses the item, deduct the charges spent from the temporary charges first. When the *power surge* expires, any remaining temporary charges are lost.

*XP Cost:* 5 XP Ã— the level of the highest-level spell stored in the item.
